<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Manages a passive (i.e., listening) UNIX domain socket</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The ListeningSocket class encapsulates a UNIX domain socket that can listen</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and accept incoming connections. ListeningSocket is portable and supports</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Windows builds begining with Insider Build 17063 ListeningSocket is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// designed for server-side operations, working alongside \\p raw&#95;socket&#95;streams</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that function as client connections.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Usage example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code&#123;.cpp&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// std::string Path = &quot;/path/to/socket&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Expected&lt;ListeningSocket&gt; S = ListeningSocket::createUnix(Path);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// if (S) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Expected&lt;std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;raw&#95;socket&#95;stream&gt;&gt; connection = S-&gt;accept();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   if (connection) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     // Use the accepted raw&#95;socket&#95;stream for communication.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If a separate thread calls ListeningSocket::shutdown, the ListeningSocket</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// file descriptor (FD) could be closed while ::poll is waiting for it to be</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Accepts an incoming connection on the listening socket. This method can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// optionally either block until a connection is available or timeout after a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// specified amount of time has passed. By default the method will block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// until the socket has recieved a connection. If the accept timesout this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// method will return std::errc:timed&#95;out</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Timeout to a negative number causes ::accept to block indefinitely</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Attempt to read from the raw&#95;socket&#95;stream&#39;s file descriptor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This method can optionally either block until data is read or an error has</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// occurred or timeout after a specified amount of time has passed. By</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// default the method will block until the socket has read data or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// encountered an error. If the read times out this method will return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// std::errc:timed&#95;out</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Ptr The start of the buffer that will hold any read data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Size The number of bytes to be read</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// \\param Timeout An optional timeout duration in milliseconds</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ssize&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-socket-stream/#af22cc7ec55d3e7b68bf83856ed991f0e">read</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::chrono::milliseconds &amp;Timeout = std::chrono::milliseconds(-1));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
